sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react"; import Cookies from "js-cookie"; import { toast } from "react-toastify"; export default function Profile() { const userInfo = JSON.parse(Cookies.get("user")); const [formInput, setformInput] = useState({ image: {}, name: "", email: "", oldPassword: "", newPassword: "", confirmPassword: "", }); function handleFormChange(e) { const target = e.target; const name = target.name; const value = target.value; setformInput({ ...formInput, [name]: value, }); } async function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); await axios .post("http://localhost:3001/loginAdmin", formInput) .then((response) => { const res = response.data; if (res.success) { toast.success(res.success); } }) .catch((err) => { const errors = err.response.data; errors.forEach((error) => { toast.error(error); }); }); } return (
); }
